channel.title: Serverless architecture, threat model on Open Security Summit

item.title: Threat Modeling Kata Part 3
item.description: Transcript: Dinis Cruz - 00:00 You. Luis Servin - 00:02 Hi. Dinis Cruz - 00:03 Welcome to this open Security Summit in October 2023. And we have Lewis for the part three or Thread Modeling Qatar, which is a really amazing concept that a lot of people should be following because it’s all about practicing, trying these things and getting a lot of amazing momentum. So, Louis, over to you.
